Source.SQL: select jg.dizhimc diqumc, jg.dizhibm dizhibm, jg.DiZhiBMOrder, huochan.*, baby.*, perinatal.*, pregnancy.*, baby.babys + yiner.wusuizs as wusuizs, baby.babys + yiner.yiners as yiners, baby.babynans + yiner.wusuizsnan as wusuizsnan, baby.babynans + yiner.yinersnan as yinersnan, baby.babynvs + yiner.wusuizsnv as wusuizsnv, baby.babynvs + yiner.yinersrnv as yinersrnv, baby.babybms + yiner.wusuizsbm as wusuizsbm, baby.babybms + yiner.yinersbm as yinersbm from ( select dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder ) jg left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, count(*) huochanzs, sum(case when nr.babysex=1 then 1 else 0 end) huochannan, sum(case when nr.babysex=2 then 1 else 0 end) huochannv, sum(case when nr.babysex!=1 and nr.babysex!=2 then 1 else 0 end)huochanbm from cdh_newbornrecord nr left join cdh_deliveryrecord dr on nr.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join cdh_pregnantinfo pi on pi.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on dr.visitunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where pi.realregioncode != pi.homeaddress and nr.outcomeofbirth = 1 and pi.ownerarea != 1 and CONVERT(varchar(100), dr.tianbiaosj, 23) >= @登记日期Start and CONVERT(varchar(100), dr.tianbiaosj, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,DiZhiBMOrder ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) huochan on jg.dizhibm = huochan.dizhibm left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 then 1 else 0 end) babys, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 AND d.babysex = '1' then 1 else 0 end) babynans, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 AND d.babysex = '2' then 1 else 0 end) babynvs, sum(case when DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(Day,d.babybirth,d.deathdate)<=28 AND d.babysex <> '1' and d.babysex <> '2' then 1 else 0 end) babybms from perinataldeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on d.entryunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where d.mobileflag = 1 and d.status = 1 and CONVERT(varchar(100), d.entrydate, 23) >= @登记日期Start and CONVERT(varchar(100), d.entrydate, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,DiZhiBMOrder ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) baby on jg.dizhibm = baby.dizhibm left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25)<1 then 1 else 0 end) yiners, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25)<1 and d.childsex='1' then 1 else 0 end) yinersnan, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25)<1 and d.childsex='2' then 1 else 0 end) yinersrnv, sum(case when FLOOR(datediff(DY,d.birthday,d.deathdate)/365.25)<1 and d.childsex<>'2' and d.childsex<>'1' then 1 else 0 end) yinersbm, count(*) wusuizs, sum(case when d.childsex='1' then 1 else 0 end) wusuizsnan, sum(case when d.childsex='2' then 1 else 0 end) wusuizsnv, sum(case when d.childsex<>'2' and d.childsex<>'1' then 1 else 0 end) wusuizsbm, count(*) wusuisw from underfiveyearsdeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on d.entryunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where d.mobileflag = 1 and d.status = 1 and CONVERT(varchar(100), d.entrydate, 23) >= @登记日期Start and CONVERT(varchar(100), d.entrydate, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,DiZhiBMOrder ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) yiner on jg.dizhibm = yiner.dizhibm left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when d.babyending = '2' or d.babyending = '3' or d.babyending = '4' then 1 else 0 end) perinatals, sum(case when d.babyending = '4' then 1 else 0 end) perinatalall, sum(case when d.babyending = '4' and d.babysex=1 then 1 else 0 end) perinatalnan, sum(case when d.babyending = '4' and d.babysex=2 then 1 else 0 end) perinatalnv, sum(case when d.babyending = '4' and d.babysex!=1 and d.babysex!=2 then 1 else 0 end) perinatalbm from perinataldeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on d.entryunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where d.mobileflag = 1 and d.status = 1 and CONVERT(varchar(100), d.entrydate, 23) >= @登记日期Start and CONVERT(varchar(100), d.entrydate, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,DiZhiBMOrder ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) perinatal on jg.dizhibm = perinatal.dizhibm left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, count(*) pregnancydeathnum from pregnantdeathcase d left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on d.recordreportunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where d.status = 1 and CONVERT(varchar(100), d.recordreportdate, 23) >= @登记日期Start and CONVERT(varchar(100), d.recordreportdate, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,DiZhiBMOrder ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) pregnancy on jg.dizhibm = pregnancy.dizhibm order by jg.DiZhiBMOrder asc

SQLs.SQL: select u.name,jg.FuWuJGMC from [User] u left join GY_FUWUJG jg on u.organization = jg.FUWUJGBH where job_no = @jobno
